caption: The image is an advertisement for a special sale on a white sofa. The sale price is $400, and the original price was $800. The advertisement also mentions that social media can be used to share interesting facts, true stories, and other useful information. The image is from the website [www.reallygreatsite.com](http://www.reallygreatsite.com).
texts: Social media can also be used to disseminate interesting facts, true stories, and other useful information.
